website_summaries.verdict: The best pearl necklace available. Offers preferred Akoya pearls with ideal luster, color, and shape from a quality-conscious company.
pros: High-quality, round Akoya pearls with AAA rating from a trusted company
Features durable silk threading with double knots between each pearl for added security
The pearls have icy color and superb luster
cons: Understandably, comes at a higher price than other pearl necklaces we tested

customer_reviews.title: Totally delighted!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first "good" strand of pearls I've had. I was somewhat reluctant to order them online, but the customer reviews were reassuring. I received them and I am totally pleased with the quality of these pearls! The are well-matched and very lustrous. I got the 18-inch strand, and it hits just right where it should, at the collarbone. I plan to eventually purchase matching earrings and a bracelet from The Pearl Source. The quality to value/cost of the necklace is outstanding. The box it came in was "meh"...not bad, not great, but I have no complaints at all - I feel I got what I paid for, and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Uh Clem.

customer_reviews.title: Deep Luster and flawless
customer_reviews.text: The color is pure, the luster is deep, the knots are perfect, the clasp is simple elegance, the length (18") is right for me. It can be worn dressy or casual. Jeans , white t-shirt and pearls are the bomb. The shorter 16" is more for a very young girl . The box is beautiful. Buy these without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I Wanted Nicer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to compare with set our local jeweler had made up for me - I was buying three sets of necklace, stud earrings and bracelet for granddaughters and it was pricey so wanted to compare. These were stark white and I prefer a light cream and they were double knotted but very stiff not supple so I decided to go with the local sets. For the price this necklace was fine and any woman would be pleased..
customer_reviews.author: EJBH

customer_reviews.title: The pearls are beautiful and have good luster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strand of pearls as a wedding gift. I had them appraised by a certified gemologist, and an expert in pearls. These pearls were advertised as AAA quality. Two different jewelry shops here in Indiana told me they are not AAA pearls. The pearls are beautiful and have good luster. I am happy with them and I know my fiancé will love them. I just think the stated retail value and quality rating is only the opinion of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Hanchett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pearls!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my pearls. They are beautifully lustrous. The quality is obvious. So happy with them! I am a large woman, and I was worried that the 18" length would not be appropriate, but it's perfect. I'm also glad that I went with the 7.0-7.5 mm size. They are quite substantial looking. I'm sure I will enjoy them for many years and will proudly pass them on to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. Words can't express how amazing these pearls look and the look on my wife's face when she received them. The packaging is amazing the whole presentation. Very very professional and good quality. They are gorgeous especially in the light. I will post some pictures
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for myself. The pearls are exquisite. I got the smaller MM pearls because of my budget, but they are gorgeous. I would highly recommend these as a gift. The presentation box is high end and very classy. Buy these pearls!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

customer_reviews.title: These Akoya pearls looks off-white
customer_reviews.text: I think these pearls look like old pearls as the color looks off-white and plus a little bit yellow and green under lights. I don't think these are AAA grades according to Japanese standards, at most AA grades.
customer_reviews.author: X. Li

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a beautiful pearl necklace!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is beautiful and very good quality. I love wearing it & get many compliments. I shopped around and did my homework & amazon had the best price for akoya pearls. I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: The length is good, so is the luster
customer_reviews.text: The length is good, so is the luster. But there are too many blemishes than i expected. also, the knots are way too big among pearls which turned out fewer pearls in one strand.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainlover

customer_reviews.title: True to the description
customer_reviews.text: Love my pearl necklace! I like the luster and shine! I need to take it to the jewelers to change the beautiful clasp. I live alone and struggle with fine motor skills due to RA . I had a difficult time to put it on and off. Other than the clasp the pearls I got are a treasure. The Box it came in is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine S. Savastano

customer_reviews.title: 7.5-8mm is the perfect size for the 18” length.
customer_reviews.text: These pearls were a birthday gift. The pearls are beautiful! The 7.5-8mm is the perfect size. They are exactly what I wanted. I compared companies/ratings/prices and size. Amazon was the perfect place to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: renee kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with a lovely strand of pearls for our 3rd wedding anniversary. They're perfect and I will be wearing them on our anniversary trip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mase&Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Right on the Mark
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Pearl Source and its Akoya pearls. While researching high-quality Akoya pearls, I became increasingly aware of the reliability of the Pearl Source as a guide to the understanding and purchasing of pearls. Because this purchase is for my (our) 30th anniversary it was important that there be no appearance of cutting corners, yet I wanted to remain within personal budget requirements. I am very pleased with the Princess that I have, and cannot wait to present it to my lovely wife. I expect that we will have this memory to cherish together over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will get the matching earrings
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift that was a hit. Very beautiful and her daughter is a jewelry expert and was impressed. I'm totally happy with my choice and will get the earrings to match.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: After comparing a number of sites I found your price and reviews the best deal. I also appreciated the timeliness and the presentation of the product. I saw on the Costco site the same product with a complaint that the color was pink. I hoped going with Amazon that it would be as advertised "white". Unfortunately it's a little pink.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Teague

customer_reviews.title: Homerun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. The gift box the pearls came in could of been better. However the pearls themselves beautiful, I decided on the salt water pearls. The wife absolutely loved them. Definitely homerun!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P.

customer_reviews.title: Classy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the necklace and bracelet... I am very pleased with both of my orders... They were what i expected. The clasp takes a bit of getting used to. Also, measure wrist carefully because I have very small wrists and ordered 6.5 inches length which fits almost exact... So if u have medium wrists, then 6.5 inches here would be too short for u. I ordered the 7.0-7.5mm pearl size in both which is a very standard size. I feel like anything bigger would have looked a bit out of proportion for my relatively small face. These pearls look quite classy and elegant. The shine on the pearls is very pretty. The packaging was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Anjie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap box for expensive pearls
customer_reviews.text: The pearls look ok but the box they are displayed in is very cheap. I expected something much nicer, with a satin or velvet lining. And they weren’t secured. It would have cost them another dollar for a much nicer presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Coqui

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift for those you love...
customer_reviews.text: They look so beautiful and the package is great. I am not a knower of these things, but as soon as the women I showed them to saw them they were all happy with them and found them beautiful and very elegant. I love them and I think they are the perfect gift for any woman you love. This are for my mother, and she is going to love them.... great price for a great product and of beautiful color...
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Surprise
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life, I ordered nice jewelry on line, sight unseen. I have never been more surprise when I received the Akoya pearls in the mail in two days. The beautiful brilliant luster, the nice pearl color, were more than I anticipated. The pearl strand was tightly knotted with even, consistent knots. The pearls were without blemishes and very uniform in size. The box the pearls are in are suitable for the pearls to be keep in as well as a nice gift box. I could not be more pleased with the pearls or the service I received from Amazon and THE PEARL SOURCE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and in excellent condition. I'm very pleased with this necklace and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this necklace ahead of my wife and I's 10th anniversary. It arrived very promptly, and in excellent condition. I'm very pleased with this necklace and I'm sure that my wife is going to love it. After our anniversary, I'll have her update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great pearls for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife (who never wears jewelry) loved this necklace! It was perfect length and perfect size as a nice, classy accessory to her wedding guest outfit. Also a great deal - an Akoya pearl necklace of this length and size is typically much more expensive at my local jewelry store.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and value are a great combination !
customer_reviews.text: The Pearl Source Akoya Pearls are very beautiful and a very good value. Nicely packaged and ready for gifting! Gave them to my wife for Christmas and she loves them. Great gift idea and many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first making this kind of a purchase on Amazon, but after reading the other reviews I figured it was worth a shot. I am very glad I did. The pearls are beautiful and are the real deal. Terrific value and great value from The Pearl Source. I would buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, perfectly matched and seemingly flawless pearls
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, perfectly matched and seemingly flawless pearls. My wife absolutely loves them and the luster is brilliant. A very good deal for the money as Mikimoto pearls from the same oyster beds are as much as 5-7 thousands dollars for the same size Akoya pearls!
customer_reviews.author: Paganpink

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved this pearl necklace
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this pearl necklace. The presentation box is just fine, so older reviews about that are no longer applicable. I was concerned about the 18" length not being long enough, but she assured me it is just where she wanted it, and she would definitely have told me if otherwise. I got matching earrings and bracelet for later :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Akoyas
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty akoya necklace. Pearls had a nice luster, round and great symmetry. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Pearls - at any price
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a graduation gift to a successful 33 year old. She loved them. They are very impressive. The color, shape and finish were all top notch. I wasn't crazy about the packaging and repackaged them in a fine wooden box. As the buyer i was thrilled with the pearls. The receiver was thrilled also.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Person Weaver Mfg Co Inc

customer_reviews.title: Wear it anywhere..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even know how to say how thrilled I am with this beautiful necklace. It dresses up any outfit and is truly elegant. I have worn it to weddings and funerals and it goes with every occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Classic pearls
customer_reviews.text: For a reasonable price, I have a beautifully matched, classic strand of pearls.
customer_reviews.author: LuvGr8Gizmos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful string of pearls. I was hesitant to order on line without seeing the product first but was very pleasantly surprised when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Baron

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was fast and the necklace looks great. The gift box was nice but the cardboard ...
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is a Christmas gift for my wife. The shipping was fast and the necklace looks great. The gift box was nice but the cardboard outer box was bent and damaged which did not happen during shipping since the shipping box was not damaged. It was obviously packaged with a damaged box. Even though the outer box will be discarded, it does take away from the presentation of the gift when opened. Other than that, the quality and price seem to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: PCM

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive pearls. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of these. Great glow and white color. Good clasp and equal sized pearls. 1/3 the price of department store pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Benck

customer_reviews.title: Akoya Saltwater Cultured Pearl Necklace is stunning
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted an Akoya Saltwater Cultured Pearl Necklace and finally purchased one and love the luster of the pearls. It was a treat to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Klieman

customer_reviews.title: She loved them and stated "they are absolutely beautiful and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these pearls for my daughter's 18th birthday. She loved them and stated "they are absolutely beautiful and I will always remember my dad gave these to me for the 18th birthday". Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Miller

customer_reviews.title: The pearls were well matched with no noticeable imperfections and have a nice luster. Clasp is secure and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife's birthday. The pearls were well matched with no noticeable imperfections and have a nice luster. Clasp is secure and looks great. She was well pleased with the string of pearls and the matching ear rings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hester

customer_reviews.title: it looks beautiful. It will be better if came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8.5-9 mm necklace for my wife's birthday. The necklace arrived on time, it looks beautiful. It will be better if came with a certificate for the size of the product as it looks a little smaller than what I expected. I call the pearl source company and they sent me a copy of the certificate in mail. My wife is still in travel, cannot wait to see how she likes this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the strand of pearls I have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was the strand of pearls I have been looking for. It is our 10 year anniversary so I was looking for something special and I found it. The shipment came exquisitely packaged with a card of authenticity. The pearls were gorgeous to the touch. I'm sure my wife will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: and I loved it. The pearls are smooth
customer_reviews.text: I received this necklace as a birthday gift from my husband, and I loved it. The pearls are smooth, shiny and even in size. The clasp appears sturdy. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Reds

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These were received as a Christmas present from my husband, he did good! They are absolutely beautiful and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY M

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this necklace for my girlfriend's birthday. She really likes it and has gotten compliments from family and friends. She and her family have Japanese heritage, so I think that says something about the quality as well. This is the first time I've purchased pearls and the first time she has owned any. I'm happy I purchased it and would definitely buy from the seller again. The only thing I could recommend as an improvement would be the box it came in. It's not horrible, but for this level of jewelry, I think it could have been a step higher in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Lustrous Pearls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pearls as a graduation present for my daughter and could not have been more pleased with them. I worked at an independent jewelers after graduating college and these rivaled anything we carried in stock. I cannot wait to see her face when she opens them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with the purchase and would order again from The ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. I did research for a very long time before I finally pulled the trigger and bought these for her. I'm very satisfied with the purchase and would order again from The Pearl Source without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter (with the ear rings) to celebrate her job promotion. She wears it frequently and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: bjornga

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Received the necklace within two days of order. Was very pleased with its quality and the client service. The product was exactly as advertised and I look forward to being a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pearls are beautiful. I bought them for my wife who is ...
customer_reviews.text: The pearls are beautiful. I bought them for my wife who is hard to please, for our anniversary. She said it was the best gift she could have gotten.
customer_reviews.author: tony crady

customer_reviews.title: Nice pearls
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pearls. Arrived on time and appears to be as advertised. Purchased as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: On time and on the money.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered next day for a last minute anniversary gift. Necklace arrived on time in very nice packaging. Wife loves it, and pearl sizing was perfect for her. I'm not a jeweler, but the product looks great to my eye.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pickings

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a 50th birthday present for my mother-in-law and she was speechless.... I know what some of you may be thinking hahaha priceless, but I actually like my mother-in-law. These pearls were a awesome value. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I think she will love it. I know I love the price for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's my wife's Christmas present, I think she will love it. I know I love the price for good peals.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray Carmack

customer_reviews.title: An exceptional value that exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The pearls significantly exceeded my expectations. These were a gift. And they were a hit! What an exceptional value! Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality necklace, presentation box was okay, but shipping white box sucked.
customer_reviews.text: They looked so nice I thought they were fake. Great quality and weight. The box they came in did not match the pictures above, but was still a decent box. The traveling box it came in provided little protection but these are all cosmetic issues that can be either rubbed out or carefully fixed before presenting the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: The pearls appear to be completely flawless and the necklace is beautifully strung. A very high quality product and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for Mother's day and she loves them. The pearls appear to be completely flawless and the necklace is beautifully strung. A very high quality product and I have already been told I need to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: The pearls were beautiful. My daughter loved them. The box they were delivered in was elegant. It was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wabi Sabi Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality of pearls... I have seen similar necklace in other jewelery stores and even in Costco for higher price. This is a great piece to add to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: gayatri premasekharan

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased with pearls
customer_reviews.text: The beauty of this necklace was matched only by the its great value ( local jewelry stores charges two to three times as much for the same necklace- I exercised my due diligence); delivery was prompt as promised; best of all the recipient was greatly pleased. Beautiful pearls. Count me a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Bristol

customer_reviews.title: The Pearl Source offers incredibly high quality pearls at ridiculously ...
customer_reviews.text: The Pearl Source offers incredibly high quality pearls at ridiculously low prices. The quality of their pearls is breathtaking and after searching and looking at pearl necklaces in retail jewelry stores and Costco, Amazon and The Pearl Source delivered an incredibly high quality product at a very fare price point that could not be matched anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: HGMJR

customer_reviews.title: Great necklace
customer_reviews.text: I love those pearls I know my Wife will be thrilled,
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Fierro

customer_reviews.title: they are beautiful and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: What can i say, they are beautiful and well worth the price. Very happy with the necklace, delivery and overall a satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jaime

customer_reviews.title: 5 is perfect for her age
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter loves them! 6.0-6.5 is perfect for her age. They are pretty, they lay properly and are as good as advertised. I will be buying some for my wife very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jody S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful pearl necklace at an excellent price. It was delivered very quickly, just in time for a trip overseas for my sweetheart's birthday. Very happy with this purchase, as well as with the matching pearl earrings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lawrence McPhail, PhD

customer_reviews.title: A sure thing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife's 50th birthday. I know next to nothing about jewelry, other than women like it. This necklace was a hit, I look like a genius. So if you are like me, don't take a chance on something "you think" she will like. You're probably wrong, get this necklace and you wont have to worry about it or even do any thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Best deal available & as described
customer_reviews.text: The pearls I ordered for my wife arrived today and are as described (though I've yet to measure them, they are beautiful). Fast shipping & no complaints. I would recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: John A Walsh

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! Very fine and high quality pearls.
customer_reviews.text: NICE!!!!! Don't be afraid to buy fine jewelry from Amazon. These are fine pearls at less than half the price of a local jewelry store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classics never go out of style
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me a similar string of pearls many years ago for our first Christmas together. I loved them, but. they were stolen in a break-in two years ago. I was thrilled when I opened my birthday gift this year and saw a strand almost identical to the ones I had for so many years. They are absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: G Beckner

customer_reviews.title: ... ready to go to jeweler if they weren't as beautiful as they appeared
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and was ready to go to jeweler if they weren't as beautiful as they appeared. I couldn't be happier, they are beautiful and she will be absolutely blown away this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Allen

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and delicate
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Wife for our 30th anniversary. They are beautiful and delicate. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rlmorris

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This pearl necklace has an incredibly beautiful creamy white color/hue. All I can say is WOW.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The great price caught my attention but the fantastic reviews convinced ...
customer_reviews.text: The great price caught my attention but the fantastic reviews convinced me it was worth trying. I ordered the pearls as an anniversary gift for my wife - they arrived in 2 days and my wife absolutely loves them, the entire experience was great I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DMSVA

customer_reviews.title: My Exectations Were Exceeded
customer_reviews.text: This necklace was delivered on time. Although I am not a gem expert, the pearls are beautiful. My expectations were exceeded. In addition, in came in a very nice case, that I did not expect. This case could serve as an excellent storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Pearls are beautiful and a big hit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a push gift for my wife and gave them to her after she delivered our baby girl. I was awarded the sweetheart award from the nurses at the hospital. Pearls are beautiful and a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The set of pearls arrived on time and were just as advertised. Good quality with no blemishes to the naked eye, beautiful color and consistent pearl size throughout the strand. I'd definately use The Pearl Source again for any future pearl needs.
customer_reviews.author: SteveGS

customer_reviews.title: love my pearls!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pearls! They are beautiful and the color is exquisite!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and the quality is superb. Something I will have for a lifetime.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful string of pearls. All the pearls are round and the same hue. Very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The pearls are beautiful and are made of great quality. love them!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pearls! I I was a bit anxious about ordering pearls sight unseen but i am very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife on mothers day. She absolutely loved them, and they looked beautiful on her. Great purchase, no complaints here.

customer_reviews.title: ... for our wedding day and wasn't the least bit disappointed The quality of these pearls was fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Elegant !
customer_reviews.text: I (LOVE) my beautiful Akoya pearl necklace! It is everything it was described to be and more. The look & feel are so elegant they make you feel elegant just wearing them. Thank you Amazon & The Pearl Source.

customer_reviews.title: I gave them to my fiance and she loved them! She is planning to wear them at ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave them to my fiance and she loved them! She is planning to wear them at our wedding, which is coming up in two weeks. The quality was undeniable in the workmanship. They arrived quickly. I wasn't sure about buying jewelry on-line; however, these were better than the ones I looked at when shopping at the stores. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the quality and luster is wonderful, the packaging entirely appropriate and it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! the quality and luster is wonderful, the packaging entirely appropriate and it came with the certification card. Can't wait to give it to our daughter for her bat mitzvah.

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful piece of heirloom jewelry for our granddaughter's 16th birthday
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful piece of heirloom jewelry for our granddaughter's 16th birthday. Know she's going to love. Coloration of each pearl is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: but I am pleased with them

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful necklace! I was skeptical about ordering nice pearls ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful necklace! I was skeptical about ordering nice pearls online especially since I was looking for some to match a very nice bracelet. The quality and luster of these pearls is perfect! My fiance loved it!

feature_bullets: Classic round pearl necklace strand with genuine white Japanese Akoya saltwater pearls and 14K gold clasp in 18 inch princess length.

✦TOP QUALITY JEWELRY✦ Handpicked, real pearls with thick and iridescent nacre. Our pearls are imported directly from the source and represent the finest luster & quality. All our products are accompanied by a Genuine Cultured Pearl Guarantee.

✦ PERFECT FOR GIFTING ✦ These elegant pearls make the perfect gift for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Christmas, Hannukah, Birthdays, June Birthstone, Engagement, Brides, Bridesmaids or Graduation for any woman, adults, daughters, granddaughters, girlfriend, wife, fiancee or that special lady.
✦ MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ✦ To ensure your complete and total satisfaction, we offer a 60 day money back guarantee.
✦ A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST ✦ The Pearl Source is proud to be a member of the Jewelers of America (JA), a leading organization of the most trustworthy, professional, and ethical jewelers nationwide.
